name: SaveFilter
type: enum
summary: |
  Used by Class.DataModel.SavePlace to determine the type of save operation
  This enum determines which aspects of the current place are saved, based on
  the following options.
description: ''
codesamples: []
tags:
  - Deprecated
deprecationmessage: |
  This deprecated enum is used by Class.DataModel.SavePlace which has also
  been deprecated. Neither should be used in new work.
items:
  - name: SaveWorld
    summary: |
      Saves only the world-related data.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: SaveGame
    summary: |
      Saves only the game-related data.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: SaveAll
    summary: |
      Saves all data, including both world and game-related information.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
